item.title: Database - Conceptual Design
item.description: Table of Contents Conceptual Design? Design Process Conceptual Modelling? Entity-Relationship Model Unified Modelling Language Diagram UML Diagram Example Types of Attributes Association Multiplicity Summary of Multiplicity Syntax Association Class Recursive Relationships/Self Associations Aggregation Composition Strong and Weak Entity Type Inheritance (Superclass - Subclass) Conceptual Design When designing a database, we should: Create a list of all the real-world AND conceptual objects that we need to store data about.
